data.text: @eternallizdom We will still mask. My personal favorite is how the CDC was mocked and belittled for 2 years and now the crowd cheers them on in celebration.
@eternallizdom I have no plans to drop the mask anytime soon. I haven’t caught Covid yet, and I’d like to keep it that way.

@PurelyNicole I actually had the same thought earlier today when picking up food. If the employees are masked, I'll definitely mask up. In general, I feel like I'm still going to wear a mask but also feel the desire to unmask in some spaces now.

@eternallizdom I think the hospital rate is supposed to be accounted for, so if we start clogging up the hospitals the level will rise? 

I’ll still mask up in crowded areas, or if the employees somewhere are (if they have to wear a mask for 8 hours surely I can for 15-30 minutes or whatever.)
@eternallizdom I will continue to mask because of my health.
@PurelyNicole It very much seems to be pushing hard to endemic stage, maybe? Like, where we are supposed to be ok with getting Covid as long as we are vaxxed and don't clog up the hospitals.
@eternallizdom I’m surprised there isn’t more nuance here, like maybe “wear a mask indoors if distancing isn’t possible” in the medium category or something.
